summary: This document is an email chain from June 2020 regarding the approval of counseling sessions for two confirmed victims of Jeffrey Epstein. The correspondence involves FBI Victim Services Division personnel and mentions that one victim is represented by attorney Gloria Allred.

persons.name: Gloria Allred
persons.context: Mentioned as the legal representative for one of the Epstein victims, with all communication for that victim required to go through her office.

events.title: Approval of Victim Counseling Sessions
events.description: FBI Victim Services Division personnel correspond to approve EVAF funding for 12 counseling sessions for two confirmed victims of Jeffrey Epstein.

keyFacts: The FBI Victim Services Division was processing requests for counseling sessions for confirmed victims of Jeffrey Epstein in June 2020.
Two victims are mentioned; one is confirmed to have been victimized in a location that is redacted in the text.
One of the victims is represented by attorney Gloria Allred, requiring all communication to be routed through her office.
The correspondence indicates a procedural step to file with a Crime Victims Compensation (CVC) program to manage payment for initial counseling sessions.
